name: medicare-app
description: Modern healthcare booking app for Kenya

scripts.build: curl -o flutter.zip https://storage.googleapis.com/flutter_infra_release/releases/stable/linux/flutter_linux_3.19.6-stable.tar.xz && tar -xf flutter.zip && export PATH=`pwd`/flutter/bin:$PATH && flutter build web --web-renderer canvaskit --base-href /
